/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds and bathed in the bright light of a sunny day. 

On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban setting. The road itself is lined with power lines, a common sight in many cities, and traffic signs, guiding the flow of vehicles. 

In the distance, a highway overpass stretches across the scene, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the overpass and gives a sense of depth to the scene.
